attributes.action: Ban all UK Members of Parliament from officiating at Remembrance Day services
attributes.additional_details: Northern Ireland, Iraq, Afghanistan - in every case British service personnel face prosecution for so-called 'War Crimes'. Funny that no MP has faced prosecution for sending them there!
attributes.background: Politicians start wars. Then hypocritically seek to prosecute the troops they send to fight them

rejection.details: The decision about who officiates at services is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament.
